Name: Increasing penalties for repeated violations of unlawful parking on a sidewalk or crosswalk.
Title: A Local Law in relation to increasing penalties for repeated violations of unlawful parking on a sidewalk or crosswalk
Summary: This unconsolidated local law would require the DOF to create a schedule of graduated penalties for repeated unlawful parking on sidewalks and crosswalks.
Text:
Int. No. 1180

By Council Members Van Bramer and Espinal 

..Title
A Local Law in relation to increasing penalties for repeated violations of unlawful parking on a sidewalk or crosswalk 
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. The commissioner of finance shall implement a schedule of graduated penalties for repeat violations of rules promulgated pursuant to sections 1200 to 1203 of the vehicle and traffic law prohibiting stopping, standing or parking a vehicle on a sidewalk or crosswalk. The schedule of graduated penalties shall include double penalties for a second violation within one year of any first violation and triple penalties for a third violation within two years of the first violation.  
      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect immediately upon enactment.
